title: Gaining 12LP and losing 27LP.

embed.description: Kasaii / Diamond 4 12LP / 107W 100L Win Ratio 52% / Lucian - 20W 15L Win Ratio 57%, Kai'Sa - 4W 9L Win Ratio 31%, Ezreal - 4W 9L Win Ratio 31%, Jhin - 7W 5L Win Ratio 58%, Irelia - 6W 5L Win Ratio 55%

body:
Hello,

I'm a previous seasons challenger player and have never had such a bad LP win/loss before so I thought i'd question.
I know it goes off MMR and it definitely makes sense if a player has a bad Win/loss ratio to give them less LP when winning and take a lot when losing.
To keep them from going into a rank they don't suit.

I recently returned to league and over the passed 2 months or so I've been climbing back from Gold 4, probably cause I didn't play this account last season.
The climb was smooth, easy as you can expect from a higher rank smurfing in low ranks.

The moment I hit diamond, probably 2-3weeks ago?, All i've been getting is LP below 14 per win and losing above 26lp per game.

Can this be explained to me please? I gained 12LP once and lost 27lp the next, thats a 2.5:1 ratio almost. 
Even in challenger people barely hit a 60% win rate. How does this even make sense, I came into diamond with over 70% Winrate, the first game i won was 13lp. Im still above 50% winrate but it's been on a heavy decline because of tilting my progress is no matter how hard I try, I cannot win 4 games and lose 1 just to gain 10-15lp.

replies.body:
Someone explained this to me a while back.
"Don't gain much because you're versing trash so you don't get rewarded as much for beating trash. But if you lose to trash, you'll get punished for losing so badly"

Pretty much how they explained it to me, but that was like, earlyish last year.

I understand when I'm in a game where I'm a higher rank yeah makes sense. But how did my mmr get messed up so bad the moment I get into diamond. It was a fast climb from gold since my placements, fair cause I haven't played in a season but I climbed getting 20+ lp but the moment I get diamond, no games have I gotten over 13lp. My account is messed up.
